name: Jungle Adventure
description:
I arrive in the jungle to save my best friend, Ara.
Explore the jungle, collect the Igrass.
With the Igras you collected, defeat the boss, and save her.

It is a VR FPS game.

While you're moving the jungle, you're learning weapons.
We'll destroy the monsters, and when we get to the final boss,
It is a game of summoning monsters to fight.
